name: Massacre à l'Auberge-Inn
description:
Game made during the 2019 Valleyfield Gamejam. After 46 hours, we came up with this game and won second place. We worked really hard and were exhausted, but it was fun and worth it!

The theme given to us was the "inn", and bonus criteria were to have a russian propaganda poster, an Easter egg and the red balloon from "IT".

The team:

  • Christophe Lauzon - Environment artist
  • Sorana Maria Sarac - Character artist
  • Jimmy Tremblay-Bernier - Data programmer
  • William Gingras - Gameplay programmer
  • Yoann Paquette - UI programmer
  • Catherine Beaudoin-Rheault - Sound designer
  • Rachel Boulay - Character animator
